    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Setes the content view accordingly and fetches values for variables global and and displayedEvent. Also calls in-class methods for setting up the dynamic UI elements.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - used for super class constructor call

      • setupTextViews

        private void setupTextViews()
        Sets up every TextView in the activity using info from the displayed event.

      • setupCategorySpinner

        private void setupCategorySpinner()
        Sets up the Spinner UI element used for selecting categories.

      • setupPickers

        private void setupPickers()
        Sets up time and date pickers for the start and end times for the event. Initializes them with information from the displayed event.

      • saveChanges

        public void saveChanges(View view)
        If the current input information is valid, it is all used to update the displayed event's data. If the weekly option is selected, the new events are created here and added to the EventManager's eventList. This method also calls finish() to return to the previous activity.
        Parameters:
        view - the clickable view that triggers this method

      • deleteEvent

        public void deleteEvent(View view)
        OnClick method for the Delete Event button. Removes the displayed event from the EventManager's list.
        Parameters:
        view - the view that triggers this method

      • currentInfoIsValid

        private boolean currentInfoIsValid()
        Checks all currently input information from UI elements for veracity. If they cause any issue at all (null pointers, weekly event collisions, etc.), then the information is not valid.
        Returns:
        boolean value: True if the information is valid, false otherwise.
